meanings.definition: A miniature version of golf played on a small course with various obstacles.
meanings.sent1: We had fun playing minigolf at the park.
meanings.sent2: Let's go to the minigolf course this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The windmill obstacle in minigolf made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the twists and turns of the minigolf course felt like a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The colorful decorations on the minigolf course made it enchanting.

meanings.definition: To play a game of minigolf.
meanings.sent1: I want to minigolf with my friends after school.
meanings.sent2: They minigolfed competitively during the tournament.
meanings.sent3: He minigolfed so enthusiastically that he almost hit the ball out of the course.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in minigolfing was like watching a skilled artist at work.
meanings.sent5: Minigolfing under the stars added a magical touch to the evening.
